product_data.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops at night after cleansing

description.description:
```json
{
  "title": "AquaShield Niacinamide Serum - Advanced Oil Control and Acne Reduction",
  "description": "AquaShield Niacinamide Serum is a potent skincare solution designed to address oily and acne-prone skin. This 5% Niacinamide serum effectively controls oil production, reduces acne marks, and minimizes pores, revealing a smoother and more even-toned complexion. With its unique blend of Niacinamide and Zinc PCA, this serum provides long-lasting benefits for a healthier and more radiant skin.",
  "highlights": [
    "Controls oil production to prevent excessive shine",
    "Reduces acne marks and scars for a clearer complexion",
    "Minimizes pores to give skin a smoother appearance",
    "Suitable for oily and acne-prone skin types",
    "Contains 5% Niacinamide for enhanced efficacy",
    "Also features Zinc PCA for additional skin benefits"
  ],
  "usage_instructions": "To use, apply 2–3 drops of AquaShield Niacinamide Serum at night after cleansing. Gently massage into the skin until fully absorbed. Note: You may experience slight dryness during initial use, but this should subside as your skin adjusts to the product."
}
```
